0.0.3.readme:
co-mongodb
==========

[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/ArnaudCourbiere/co-mongodb.png?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/ArnaudCourbiere/co-mongodb)

Manipulation library to use the mongodb native driver with generator based flow control libraries such as co.

Examples to come soon...
